Beautiful color and looks great on.

评论概述: ATHMILE Womens Long Sleeve Shirts - one of my favorite brands!
评论详情: ATHMILE has become one of my favorite brands. The quality of their clothing is superior on a consistent basis. This shirt has quickly become one of my favorites. I absolutely adore the color and the fabric on the shirt. I wear it frequently under my scrubs at work, but I also wear it at home and on the weekends. It goes with so many things that I like to wear. I normally do not wear the same clothing at work as I do at home. It's just kind of a rule since I'm a nurse. But this is an exception. I may just end up buying another one so that I have one dedicated for work and one for home. The fit is fantastic, just as pictured. I weigh 107 pounds and I ordered the small. If this shirt has caught your eye, I would suggest just go ahead and buy it. He will not regret it. Five stars.

There are a couple features of this top that led me to give it 3 stars: 1) the color 2) the length.  Specifically, 1) the red color is more like a tomato red rather than the deep red shown in the product photos. 2) This is NOT a crop top as is stated in the product title. This is a regular length top. I'm 5'1" and it goes way past my waist.  The fabric however is very soft and the fit is snug. Very comfortable as activewear.
My daughter LOVES this shirt!! It’s one of her faves!! She’s 12, 5’4”. 125 Ilbs
SO comfortable, form fitting without being too tight. Very breathable and color is true to image

Large fits a 5'3", 140lb, 34DD stature nicely. Form-fitted and flattering top. Shoulders have a bit of structure to them. Top is more cropped than not but would not say this is a true cropped top, which is prefer. Feels like a T-shirt material mixed with the new athletic/trendy type of material. Feels very soft and provides a bit of compression, but has some stretch. Does not feel quite like a double-lined top but also doesn't feel like a single/thinner top. Maybe a 1.5 lined top, haha. Overall a good top, and is great as an underscub option.
Beautiful color & fit! super stylish....looks a lot more expensive than it was! Could be a lulu knockoff!

The fit on the shirt is all good until you get to the neck. I found it to be too tight and restricting. The sleeves are extra long,going into the palms, but helps keep your hands warmer. It's a slim fitting shirt with flattering curves. The comfort level isn't bad but not the best. It's a basic decent quality winter shirt.
This fit true to size. Was a true red color. Great for the costume I needed it for
Soft and stretchy but snatches you in

This crop top is comfortable and soft.  I ordered the small, my usual size is medium, and it fit snug.  I sized down based on the reviews but I think a medium would have been fine.  The gray color is attractive and can be dressed up or down.  I will wear this as a base layer this winter.  By the way, the sleeves are longer than most, and I love them.

**Note: I received this item through the Amazon Vine Program. This does not impact the rating.**  I have a job that is at times very cold. This top was perfect for layering underneath my other clothing to stay warm. I ordered a medium for arm length and the fit is snug. This top is so warm that I sometimes do not need to add a jacket. It is also very comfortable, and I think it’s warmer than my thermal wear.  It is as pictured, though I would say the one con is that the shoulders sometimes have a boxy, stiff look. For me, since I’m layering this top, it’s not a big deal since it’s serving its purpose. One other thing is that this is not something you can wear unless it’s cold. It is a very warm shirt, so can only comfortably be worn in a cold environment.  Overall: I am very pleased with this and love that I’ve found something warm enough for the environment I’m in. In fact, I would say it is one of my warmest thermal shirts, and I haven’t yet found something that works as well.

I usually am an XS and this fits me pretty well. It could be more fitted but not bad. The material is soft and comfortable and the color is lovely. It's my go-to daily shirt for a casual look. Really like it!

Arm length is very very long and it’s just baggy overall I got an XS and usually I’m a M so the shirt being baggy is not good and it came smelling not good but not bad not worth the money and the color is see through for white

Super soft shirt. Very comfy. I wear a small and im 5'1 and this shirt is a mid drift showing shirt! not too short and not too long so its perfect for that semi cropped look to show the perf amount of tummy but not too much! i love this shirt i wear it with my low rise bottoms and its STUNNING

Overall, I really love this shirt. The material is super comfortable and stretchy, and it fits me very well. My issue is with the area around the shoulders. For some reason, the material scrunched up at the shoulders and I'm not sure if it's intentional or if my shoulders just arent broad enough to fill it out. I love everything else though.
Wonderful fit runs true to size very comfortable. Want to get it in all colors. Great stretch.
Very tight so order a size up. It’s not very flattering to those with a larger chest it does bring attention.

评论概述: Soft and stretchy long sleeved  crop top
评论详情: This is a long sleeved crewneck crop top made of soft and stretchy fabric.The fabric is  88% Polyester and 12% Spandex, so it has a lot of stretch to it.  It's form fitting and hugs the body.  The light green is a pretty shade and will go with any color pants.

I really like the color and the material of this shirt.  It is not cheaply made, the sewing is as I would expect it.  If you want it to be tight, order your normal size, if you want a slightly looser fit, size up at least one size.  Makes a great casual layering shirt.  I personally would not wear it alone unless I sized up to make it more relaxed as it will show every little bump that most women don't want to draw attention to.  :-)
Cute top, flattering, soft and stretchy! This is a perfect staple piece for the fall/winter!

This shirt is cute and has a great color. The fit is a little weird around the shoulders and the sleeves were really long. The length was good and was longer than a crop top but shorter than a t shirt.

I ordered this for my daughter in size small.  It fits her nicely.  She has worn and washed it dozens of times and it still looks new.  For reference: Height 5'4, Weight 106, Bust 31, Waist 24, Hips 34

I expected the shirt to be like any typical plain white shirt, nothing special. But I was blown away with the quality and for that price I'm def buying more. The shirt has a buttery feel to it and the fit is beautiful.

This is such a gorgeous color blue, exactly what I expected but even prettier in person! The long sleeves are just the right length and make this shirt nice and warm. The fabric is soft and has just the right amount of stretch. For the price, I think the quality feels pretty good, no issues so far! I’d recommend!
This t-shirt is very comfortable. The color is beautiful. This fits true to size The price is very affordable.

I weight 135 athlete build . Got a medium. Fits good, sits right at my hip bones.  Wish it was little longer but definitely will wear under a vest  5’7 ref
Nice shirt that accentuate the shoulders and midriff without showing a ton of skin. Super stretchy and molds to your skin.

My picky teen likes the color and fit of this shirt. High neck/ very modest. Definitely slim cut. Looks pretty on her & is comfortable. Washes well, good quality especially for the price. Very pleased.

Nice quality t shirt. It has a nice fit and made of a nice thick material comfortable and soft on the skin.
The shirt is actually a bright red/orangish, not a darker red as pictured. Material is nice. Fits my teen daughter nice. She’s 100lbs and 5’1” and we got the extra small.
The fabric is soft and stretchy great for layering. Form flattering. The neck line is cute. Pretty colors. Neither too thick nor too thin.

Only plus here was the material…The torso section of the shirt was oddly short, making the fit feel off, kinda felt like a crop top. This issue persisted even in the larger size, seems like a problem with the sizing or manufacturing.

Like other reviewers mention, this shirt runs small. It's not just that it's tight - the shoulder seams are 1-2 sizes smaller than you would expect from the size you're getting. That being said, if you size up and are still fine with a very fitted basic tee, this is perfect for you. It's really soft and would work great tucked into a high-waisted pant since it is thin enough to not be bulky and tight enough to stay in place. The grey color looks like a nice washed and faded black.
This is a nice summer shirt.  Much better fit than a regular t shirt.  I would say the size is true although it does have a snug fit.

The red is a bit more bright than it shows in the picture, but it's still very cute! It's a nice thick material that isn't see-through at all, and it's perfect to wear under something or by itself. I wore it out one evening and it was very comfortable. I also think it's the perfect length for me and isn't cropped at all. I'd definitely recommend this if you're looking for a basic top you can wear with a lot of different outfits!
The material is unbelievably soft. The crop top is perfect for summer or for workouts. I love how simple it is to clean this as well. It fits perfectly and the fabric has amazing stretch.
This white tee shirt is simple, perfect for everyday wear. Comfortable and easy to match, it's a must-have basic in your closet.

评论概述: Soft and High Quality Basic Shirt
评论详情: Received this for my wife, and she loves it. It's extremely soft and a high quality material. She actually wants to add more, in different colors, to her collection because of how much she loves it. At 12 dollars, it's a great price for a good basic t shirt.

I’m 100% in love with this shirt. The material is incredible, the style is very flattering and fitted but still stretchy and not overly tight or uncomfortable in any way. The tan color is great with any outfit, and it also washes well in the washing machine. I haven’t dried it because I avoid that for longevity purposes. But it comes out of the dryer and quickly dries with no wrinkles. Very pleased and would love this in every color available!!

This tee is beautiful! I got this for my teen daughter who is 100 lbs and 5' tall. The size small fits her snugly and looks smooth on her. It hits her waist and is easily tucked in. She really likes the fabric and soft pink color.

Pleasantly surprised with this top! I got this to wear under blazers for work and as a simple t-shirt with jeans. It's tight and hugs the curves, but also is smooth and has a soft feel. I'm usually a medium but I ordered one size up and the large fits like a regular length t-shirt that comes to my waist. The coffee is also a beautiful shade of brown. I recommend this!
Very nice shirt fits well quality is good thanks
I love the material that this shirt is made of.  It is so soft and comfortable!  I definitely enjoy wearing it!

This is a nice soft material shirt. The quality is good, but the fit is a little off. I ordered a medium for my daughter who only weighs about 118 pounds and it was pretty tight on her. I would order a size or two up.

I am loving these cropped tops as a layering piece. I’m older, and I would not wear them on their own, but they are great for anything that you would wear a camisole for. I love the fact that it’s short sleeves and high neckline give some more modesty, while the cropped length doesn’t interfere with your jeans or other shirts.  I love the coffee color I chose, and will wear it with lots of outfits. The knit fabric is smooth, high quality, and very stretchy, and will hold up superbly in the washer and dryer. I wish they had other “non typical” colors, to add a pop and contrast to outfits, I would buy them all!

I ordered a size medium in this shirt and it was perfect! I am a size 8 US, and fall between a small and medium. I am glad I sized up! I feel compressed but supported in this top without feeling or looking like a sausage. It fits very nicely and flatters the lumps/bumps. I also really like the fabric. It is made of a buttery smooth material that is thick for compression but not heavy to wear. I love this shirt!
This is a nice white shirt.  Looks very clean and smooth and feels soft. I find it comfortable and I like the style. Washed up well so far also, no pilling or shrinking.

评论概述: Love the top but run WAY small.

评论概述: RUNS SMALL! I Sized UP! Great Price! Love the Color!
评论详情: Current price $12.99. Coffee gray - Size XL. I'm 5'6 and 130 pounds. Normally I wear a medium, but the top measurements seemed really small, so I sized WAY UP! The measures 36 inches across the chest. The chart states 39 inches. The XL is 22 inches long and measures 22 inches as advertised. I love the top. Nice color. Very neutral and will go with everything. Looks good with jeans or skirts! 4 Stars. Hope you find this review and pictures helpful! Great price!

This crop top t-shirt is really cute but it's much thinner than I expected. The shirt is made of a stretchy material and is soft on the skin. I ordered the size 2X but it fit more like an XL. I will be layering with a cardigan or cropped jean jacket with cargo pants.
The color is great and I really like that . Im a Md but got the large and its very tight . Its very soft and stretchy .

I don't have complaints about the quality of this shirt. I don't see any issues with the construction of it, and the material has a nice smooth feel with decent stretch. That said, this shirt runs really small. My bust size (36C) put me between a medium and a large; I chose the medium because I have a petite frame. Unfortunately, it was simply too tight, especially in the chest. I believe the size large would fit me. (For reference, my usual size is a small.) Definitely size up in this one.
This is a good basic shirt. The material is soft and seems well made.  It is cropped and stretchy. I ordered a medium it fit as expected.  The color is as shown.

This is a snug fitting T-Shirt, and if you like a snug fit, it is true to size. If you prefer a loose shirt you may want to size up or select a different style.  I like the feel of the fabric and the quality is good when you consider the price. It's a good choice for a basic T for spring and summer.

This shirt is a great for for me! I am thin and have a short torso, so the length and fit is perfect. For an average sized or taller person it may be more of a crop top. The price point ($12.99 at time of review) is right. It's comfy and flattering to my form.
This is a nice and soft top with good stretch
I like this T Shirt & the color I chose. This looks great with jeans, skirts, shorts, capri leggings. Fits true to size, well made & good quality.

This is a simple and cute basic top. Material is soft, and quality is good. Definitely order your normal size. I’m 5ft 157 lbs and I usually wear medium and some smalls. The medium was my size but snug.
This light green scoop neck T-shirt is a basic yet essential piece for any summer wardrobe. The short sleeve crop top is cute and slim-fitting, ideal for pairing with Y2k style outfits.

It’s super stretchy so depending how tight or lose you want it you can size up and down. Definitely recommend this since it’s super soft and nice everyday shirt.
I got this top in a medium and it looks great. It's a cozy fabric, comporable to most lounge wear.
Right amount of stretch so snug but not tight. A little shorter than I imagined from the listing photos but not too bad. Comfy!

For all that it's tight, it's actually quite comfortable (soft) and the material is nice quality - it's not see through and holds it shape well. I'll just make sure to wear a seamless bra with it.

The color is not quite the same as the image. The fabric is soft..these are a really tight fit. They are also SHORT IN LENGTH. It is not a full length shirt and probably has 1-2 inches longer than a true crop top. For me, it was an awkward length but the shirt itself was great.
